00039 template<int dimworld>
00040 struct FoamGridFamily
00041 {
00042     typedef GridTraits<
00043         2,   // dim
00044         dimworld,   // dimworld
00045         Dune::FoamGrid<dimworld>,
00046         FoamGridGeometry,
00047         FoamGridEntity,
00048         FoamGridEntityPointer,
00049         FoamGridLevelIterator,
00050         FoamGridLeafIntersection,
00051         FoamGridLevelIntersection,
00052         FoamGridLeafIntersectionIterator,
00053         FoamGridLevelIntersectionIterator,
00054         FoamGridHierarchicIterator,
00055         FoamGridLeafIterator,
00056         FoamGridLevelIndexSet< const FoamGrid<dimworld> >,
00057         FoamGridLeafIndexSet< const FoamGrid<dimworld> >,
00058         FoamGridGlobalIdSet< const FoamGrid<dimworld> >,
00059         unsigned int,   // global id type
00060         FoamGridLocalIdSet< const FoamGrid<dimworld> >,
00061         unsigned int,   // local id type
00062         CollectiveCommunication<Dune::FoamGrid<dimworld> >
00063             > Traits;
00064 };

00120         std::fill(freeIdCounter_.begin(), freeIdCounter_.end(), 0);

00124         ~FoamGrid()
00125         {
00126             // Delete level index sets
00127             for (size_t i=0; i<levelIndexSets_.size(); i++)
00128                 if (levelIndexSets_[i])
00129                     delete (levelIndexSets_[i]);
00130         }
00131         
00132         
00135         int maxLevel() const {
00136             return entityImps_.size()-1;;
00137         }
00138         
00139         
00141         template<int codim>
00142         typename Traits::template Codim<codim>::LevelIterator lbegin (int level) const {
00143             if (level<0 || level>maxLevel())
00144                 DUNE_THROW(Dune::GridError, "LevelIterator in nonexisting level " << level << " requested!");
00145 
00146             return Dune::FoamGridLevelIterator<codim,All_Partition, const Dune::FoamGrid<dimworld> >(Dune::get<dimension-codim>(entityImps_[level]).begin());
00147         }
00148

00152         typename Traits::template Codim<codim>::LevelIterator lend (int level) const {
00153             if (level<0 || level>maxLevel())

00155             
00156             return Dune::FoamGridLevelIterator<codim,All_Partition, const Dune::FoamGrid<dimworld> >(Dune::get<dimension-codim>(entityImps_[level]).end());
00157         }

00210         int size (int level, int codim) const {
00211 
00212             // Turn dynamic index into static index
00213             if (codim==2)
00214                 return Dune::get<0>(entityImps_[level]).size();
00215             if (codim==1)
00216                 return Dune::get<1>(entityImps_[level]).size();
00217             if (codim==0)
00218                 return Dune::get<2>(entityImps_[level]).size();
00219 
00220             return 0;
00221         }
00222

00298         bool mark(int refCount, const typename Traits::template Codim<0>::EntityPointer & e)
00299         {
00300             if (not e->isLeaf())
00301                 return false;
00302 
00304             if (refCount>=1)
00305                 const_cast<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>*>(getRealImplementation(*e).target_)->markState_ = FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>::REFINE;
00306             else if (refCount<0)
00307                 const_cast<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>*>(getRealImplementation(*e).target_)->markState_ = FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>::COARSEN;
00308             else
00309                 const_cast<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>*>(getRealImplementation(*e).target_)->markState_ = FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>::DO_NOTHING;
00310 
00311             return true;
00312         }
00313         
00318         int getMark(const typename Traits::template Codim<0>::EntityPointer & e) const
00319         {
00320             if (getRealImplementation(*e).target_->markState_ == FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>::REFINE)
00321                 return 1;
00322             if (getRealImplementation(*e).target_->markState_ == FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>::COARSEN)
00323                 return -1;
00324             
00325             return 0;
00326         }

00426 
00428     void setIndices()
00429     {
00430         // //////////////////////////////////////////
00431         //   Create the index sets
00432         // //////////////////////////////////////////
00433         for (int i=levelIndexSets_.size(); i<=maxLevel(); i++) {
00434             FoamGridLevelIndexSet<const FoamGrid >* p
00435                 = new FoamGridLevelIndexSet<const FoamGrid >();
00436             levelIndexSets_.push_back(p);
00437         }
00438         
00439         for (int i=0; i<=maxLevel(); i++)
00440             if (levelIndexSets_[i])
00441                 levelIndexSets_[i]->update(*this, i);
00442 
00443         // Update the leaf indices
00444         leafIndexSet_.update(*this);
00445         
00446         // IdSets don't need updating
00447 
00448         }
00449 #if 0         
00450 
00451         CollectiveCommunication ccobj_;
00452 #endif
00453     // Stores the lists of vertices, edges, elements for each level
00454     std::vector<tuple<std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld> >,
00455                       std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld>>,
00456                       std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>> > > entityImps_;
00457 
00459         std::vector<FoamGridLevelIndexSet<const FoamGrid>*> levelIndexSets_;
